content.raw: Oh, interesting. I think the resize warped the arrows so that they look more like an oval instead of a circle. What about this version? You'll need to change the colors again to match. I can make one in any size. [16x16](https://www.dropbox.com/s/bj99bs5tgujlc31/rotate_16x16.png)
content.html: Oh, interesting. I think the resize warped the arrows so that they look more like an oval instead of a circle. What about this version? You'll need to change the colors again to match. I can make one in any size. 16x16
